constituent: bird, white, dove, one, tail feathers
heisigStory: Dove . . . one . . . tail feathers. This is, of course, the character from which we derived the primitive meaning of dove. Note the lengthening of the second stroke.
koohiiStory1: There is only one bird with such beautiful white tail feathers: the albino peakcock.
koohiiStory2: The BIRD let loose a WHITE ONE from it´s TAIL FEATHERS...right on my new car!
words:
鳥居(とりい): torii (Shinto shrine archway)
渡り鳥(わたりどり): migratory bird, bird of passage
小鳥(ことり): (small) bird
鳥(とり): bird, fowl, poultry
